generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and lined with buildings and vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including commercial and residential structures.
- fence: A fence is visible on the left side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk and near the scaffolding.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles, positioned along the street.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, with one showing a yellow light.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a blue circular sign with an upward arrow and a "No Entry" sign.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- car: A silver car is visible driving on the road ahead, approaching the intersection.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is partially visible on the left side of the image, near the sidewalk.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
